title: Microsoft | L61 | Bengaluru
content:
* Education: Tier-1 B.Tech
* Years of Experience: 3
* Prior Experience: Service Based 
* Date of the Offer: June 2024
* Company: Microsoft
* Title/Level: L61 (SDE-2)
* Location: Bengaluru, India
* Salary: 28L
* Relocation: 0
* Signing Bonus: 3L(1st year) + 1L(2nd year)
* Stock bonus: $50K stock grant vested over 4 years (~10L)
* Bonus: Performance-based bonus up to 20% of salary every year
* Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): ~40L( 28 + 10 + 2.8)
* Benefits: Standard Microsoft
* Other details: Negotiated once, Original Offer was for L60 with base 25L and stocks $50K.
* Previous TC: 21L

Have accepted the offer, want to join Microsoft but feels like a lowball offer for L61. so confused...

title: Amex vs ServiceNow
content:

2L on 13th month payroll & 2L on 19th month payroll

Total Comp: (Salary + Bonus +PF+ Stock):
1st Year: ~ ₹ 220000 + (4 lac stock)  ₹ 270000
Date of offer:July2024
Other Benefits: Standard benifits cab and free food

I am in dilemma on what should i consider SeviceNow pays more , but Amex has good brand value in data science. Please help me in which company to prefer
